TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Suru, title = Suru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suru} }

S.FORM: Suru Itiniay i Tai'an Cen no Miaoli ko Suru a niyaro', 95 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 292 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 279 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal94%, Amis1%, Rukai0.5%, roma0.5%.

Soro Itiniay i Tai'an Cen no Miaoli ko Soro a niyaro', 95 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 292 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 279 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal94%, Amis1%, Rokai0.5%, roma0.5%.
